title: The Crucifixion
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [ LRC, scratched: [Schanker]; on back, in pencil: [S
description: colorful, abstract image with large black cross at center; light blue, yellow and white figure on cross; scratched flower-like form at right edge; brown and black thinner crosses at left and right
creditline: Gift of Tom Rassieur in honor of Rev. Richard Hillstrom
